entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
